justification: Vendor details support real-time delivery and management of alerts and notifications ('SignalR: enables real-time alerts…', 'Event Hub: facilitates alerts…', 'Power BI: supports alerts…'). However, it lacks specifics on message queues, triggers, and the process for managing (not just displaying) these elements, as required in the ability statement.
ability: The ability to display and manage alerts, messages, message queues, triggers, and notifications
